summary: A pytest‑based test suite that verifies the behavior of the IPA‑based grapheme‑to‑phoneme conversion model, checking locale support, case handling, out‑of‑vocabulary handling, Unicode normalization, and symbol replacement logic.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the IPA G2P component used in text‑to‑speech pipelines, enabling reliable pronunciation generation across different languages and input variations.
